ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And call them to a halt. They will be asked:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And detain them, for they will be questioned."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and detain them there; they will be called to account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Stop them. They must be questioned."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And stop them – they are to be questioned.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But stop them, verily, they are to be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And stop them, for they shall be questioned:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And halt them, to be questioned:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And stop them, for they must be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and stop them there for questioning:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And stop them; verily they are to be questioned:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [But first] stop them! For they must be questioned.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But stop them, for they must be asked:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But stop them, verily they are to be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And halt them so that they may be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And stop them. They are to be questioned.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:24] But [first] stop them, detain them on the path, for they must be questioned, about all their sayings and deeds, and it will be said to them in rebuke:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah would also say to the angels: (And stop them) detain them in hell, (for they must be questioned) about this claim; it is also said that this means: they will be questioned about their rejection of "there is no deity except Allah". 506
